import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import css from './Profile.css' export const Profile = ({ username, tag, location, avatar, followers, views, likes }) => { return

{username}

{tag}

{location}

  • Followers 100
  • Views 2000
  • Likes 3000
} Profile.PropTypes = { username: PropTypes.string.isRequired, tag: PropTypes.string.isRequired, location: PropTypes.string.isRequired, avatar: PropTypes.element, followers: PropTypes.number, views: PropTypes.number, likes: PropTypes.number, }
